HediffDef.label: stinger technique
HediffDef.description: Knowledge of the Stinger technique - a lightning-fast dash attack. This combat skill allows the user to instantly close distance and strike with devastating precision.

HediffDef.label: judgement cut technique
HediffDef.description: Mastery of the Judgement Cut - a ranged dimensional slash. This advanced combat technique allows the user to cut through space itself, striking distant enemies with phantom blades.

HediffDef.label: drive technique
HediffDef.description: Knowledge of the Drive technique - a vertical energy slash that creates projectiles. This advanced combat technique allows the user to launch energy projectiles that pass through obstacles and strike distant enemies.

HediffDef.label: drive burn
HediffDef.description: Burning energy from a Drive projectile. Deals continuous damage over time.

HediffDef.label: void slash mastery
HediffDef.description: This character has learned the Void Slash technique, allowing them to unleash debuffing cone attacks.

HediffDef.label: void slash debuff
HediffDef.description: The target has been struck by a void slash, reducing their movement speed and combat effectiveness while causing minor bleeding.

HediffDef.label: gun stinger technique
HediffDef.description: Mastery of the Gun Stinger technique - a teleporting shotgun attack. This advanced combat technique allows the user to instantly appear behind enemies and deliver devastating point-blank shotgun blasts.
